name: Kosmosphere
description:
Single player 2D side-scrolling shooter where your main goal is to try not to die for across the stage controlling a flying mech while a dozen bullets flying your surroundings. Take the bullets, shoot the enemies, dodge the bullets, collect to power up, and get the high score.

You need to pay attention to your bullet energy gauge!

When the gauge is empty, the player can take the bullets to fill energy. But when it is full, the player will take damage.

Remember, only blue colored bullets that can be converted to energy.

The game currently on development.
